content.rendered:
Directed by Ryan Coogler

Written by Ryan Coogler. Joe Robert Cole. Ryan Coogler

Star Angela Bassett(Ramonda). Tenoch Huerta(Namor). Martin Freeman(Everett K. Ross). Danai Gurira(Okoye). Lupita Nyong’o(Nakia). Letitia Wright(Shuri). Michaela Coel(Aneka).Richard Schiff. Winston Duke(M’Baku). Dominique Thorne(Riri Williams). Mabel Cadena(Namora). Florence Kasumba(Ayo). Alex Livinalli(Attuma). María Mercedes Coroy(Princess Fen). Isaach De Bankolé(River Tribe Elder). Shiquita James(Dora Milaje). Janeshia Adams-Ginyard(Nomble).Kamaru Usman. Juan Carlos Cantu(Friar). Dorothy Steel(Merchant Tribe Elder). Jarrell Pyro Johnson(Jabari Warrior). Dan Matteucci(Warrior). Gigi Bermingham(French Secretary of State).Sope Aluko. Shalet Monique(FBI Agent).Curtis Bannister. Aleks Alifirenko Jr.(Warrior). Chandra Gaines(The Merchant Tribe). Melinda Russell(Federal Agent (credit only)). Nicanor Mendoza III(River Tribesman). Ivy Haralson(Dora). Brent Moorer Gaskins(Wakandan Scientist). Floyd Anthony Johns Jr.(Jabari Warrior). Aba Arthur(Naval Engineer). Zach Andrews(Merchant (as Zachary Andrews)). Ivette Alvarez(NSA Agent). Manuel Chavez(Young Namor). Tejon Wright(Border Tribe). Jackey Mishra(Reporter). Leon S LaMar III(River Barrier Naval Officer). Jordan Bryant(FBI Agent). Henry K. Davies Jr.(Kings Guard). Skylar Ebron(Haitian School Kid #4). Stanley Aughtry(Merchant Tribe Warrior (uncredited)). Serge Burack Jr.(UN Representative (uncredited)). Linda E. Burkhart(Wakandan (uncredited)). Tommy Campbell(UN Ambassador: Norway (uncredited)). Demetrius D. Denis(Wakandan (uncredited)). Tierre Diaz(Pedestrian (uncredited)). Princess Elmore(Villager (uncredited)). Marquis Evans(DEA Agent (uncredited)). Adam Freeman(MIT Student (uncredited)). Lovell Gates(House Party Guest (uncredited)). Derrick Goodman Jr.(Jabari Warrior (uncredited)). Corliss Hambrick(River Barrier Naval Officer (uncredited)). Marlon Hayes(Kings Guard (uncredited)). Maurice T Johnson(Rivertown Tribesman (uncredited)). Maurice P. Kerry(Villager (uncredited)). Tangela Liles(Mining Tribe (uncredited)). Josue Louis-Charles(River Tribe (uncredited)). Monesha Mallard(Border Tribe (uncredited)). Alba Katiuska Mera(NSA Agent (uncredited)). Ofu Obekpa(Wakandan Royal Guard-Kings Guard (uncredited)). Babatunde Oyewo(Merchant Tribe (uncredited)). Rahiem Riley(Rivertown Tribe (uncredited)). Jordan Walker Ross(Computer Tech (uncredited)). Devan Summers(MIT Student (uncredited)). Mark Williams(Kid (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Victoria Alonso. Louis D’Esposito. Kevin Feige. Nate Moore. Barry H. Waldman

Production Marvel Studios. Walt Disney Pictures
